{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E8350 |revision=v1 |series=AC2400 |asin=B00NQ19M72,B00OG68PH4;DE; |newegg=N82E16833124565 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model=ENWA04 |est_release_date=10/01/2014 |fcc_date=07/31/2014 |fcc_id=Q87-E8350 |ic_id=3839A-E8350 |pcb_id=ENWA04 |type=wireless router, media bridge |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064;IPQ8064, 0VV, A6A146.0, EF34100; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3840BC;Quantenna, QT3840BC-ES, AA01A0D0, E01008, 1336; |cpu2_cspeed=500 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=128 MiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBDA-H4:D |fla2=4 MiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25U3235FM2I-10G |ram1=512 MiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125:K |ram1_num=2 |ram2=128 MiB |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W631GG6KB-12 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port), |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC;Quantenna, QT3840BC-ES, AA01A0D0, E01008, 1336; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B;QT2518B, AA00A0D1, A01253, 1350; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, NHU572.002B, 1350, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, E53645.4C, 1350, KOREA; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=256QAM |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2400 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E8350|pid=01t80000003fdlhAAA}} This device has probably been renamed as the [[Linksys E8400]] for marketing purposes. Text including "ENWA04" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :[[Wistron NeWeb]] (''[[WNC]]'') manuf? Per the FCC photos.. *The NAND is marked w/ 3VE17 NW264 (FBGA code NW264: [http://www.micron.com/parts/nand-flash/mass-storage/mt29f2g08abbeah4?pc=%7B1D4348BA-3AE0-4BB5-8E1F-76C12AEDFEFC%7D MT29F2G08ABBEAH4:E], :2Gbit SLC NAND), this conflicts with the data added by another user *Each of the IPQ8x's RAM chips is marked w/ 3VK77 D9PTK (FBGA code D9PTK: :[http://www.micron.com/parts/dram/ddr3-sdram/mt41k128m16jt-125?pc=%7B338582DE-C8D6-4594-91B4-B3E86A5D5374%7D MT41K128M16JT-125:K, 2Gb DDR3-1600 SDRAM]). {{WiFiCert|WFA55152|07/09/2014}} :The WFA certification indicates this device will be using ''[[Quantenna]]'' + ''[[QCA]]'' silicon.. : which the FCC photos indicate it is indeed using. According to the [https://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=156231 ''Product comparison chart of EA7500, EA8500, E8350 and E8400''] from Linksys, :the E8350 supports wireless bridge mode but cannot operate as a wireless repeater/extender. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 Internet Processor (Dual-Core @1.4GHz) *RAM: ''Micron'' MT41K128M16JT-125 (D9PTK) (DDR3L, x4/x8/x16) *Small Flash: M25P80 (SPI 5.0), ''Macronix'' MX25U3235F (4MB) *NAND Flash: ''Micron'' MT29F1G08ABBDAH4 (NW302 [VFBGA63]) :NAND Controller ID: 0x4030, NAND Device ID: 0x1580a12c *WLAN1: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880-BR4A (3x3 MIMO) [https://itw01.com/GUDQEY6.html DS] *WLAN2: [[Quantenna]] QT3840BC/QT2518B (802.11ac 4x4 MIMO) *Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337-AL3C (7-port GbE) *Bootinfo: console=ttyHSL1,115200n8 ubi.mtd=rootfs root=mtd:ubi_rootfs *Firmware: Build_for_Belkin_Linksys_AC2350_k3.4.0_2014-04-16_lke_8.9.0_r227 163_b16 ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32535-linksys-e8350-ac2400-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===See also=== *[[Linksys EA7300]] *[[Linksys EA7400]] *[[Linksys EA7500]] *[[Linksys EA8100]] *[[Linksys EA8250]] *[[Linksys EA8300]] *[[Linksys E8350]] *[[Linksys EA8350]] *[[Linksys E8400]] *[[Linksys EA8500]] __NOTOC__
